page.title: 12Entertainment
page.content: There is little organised entertainment in the area apart from the occasional barn dance and barbecue. A youth club for the younger children, organised by St Michael's Church, is held each week in the Ysgoldy Fach (the old school). The local YFC organises a few whilst drives and stages a concert but this is held in Llandovery. Certain functions are also organised by the local W.I. At christmas, there are numberous parties and fancy dress party held on New Years Eve. Most entertainemnt is sought outside Cil-y-Cwm e.g. theatre in Llandovery and cinema in Brecon and Swansea. Radio and T.V. are major source of entertainment in the home.Gone are days of large families when entertainment was provided by singing and exchanging tales
